full_translation:
*The Supreme Mystery of the Eight Radiant Registers*

**Title:** *The Supreme Mystery of the Eight Radiant Registers*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties. The first half contains the *Twenty-Four True Diagrams*, while the latter half comprises talismans of the immortals. One scroll. Base text from: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Methods* section of the *Dongzhen* Department.

---

**The Supreme Mystery of the Eight Radiant Registers**

In the first year of the Supreme August Era, on the second day of the ninth month, the Later Sage Lord Li journeyed to the Western River. Surveying the eight directions, he encountered the Primordial Celestial King riding an eight-radiance jade chariot, drawn by nine-hued dark dragons and three-pure flying clouds. Preceded by a procession of immortals, they bore flowered banners, while lions and white cranes chanted harmoniously, floating through the void to assemble above the Western River.

Lord Li bowed deeply and inquired of the Celestial King: "Formerly, I received the celestial script and jade graphs of the twenty-four diagrams, yet though I grasped their text, I did not fathom their wondrous verses. Though diagrams and eulogies exist, their forms remain absent—practicing them in obscurity, their profound principles elude clarity. Now, encountering the Heavenly Worthy, my joy is beyond words. I humbly beseech your completion of this Way, that its truth may be perfected."

Thereupon, he was instructed to purify himself with a thousand-day fast, suffuse his body with five fragrances, and face east to ingest the talisman. Once his form and spirit were fully manifested, all would become thoroughly illuminated, and every doubt instantly resolved.

Lord Li bowed again, reverently accepting the celestial decree. Strictly adhering to the heavenly rites, he observed a thousand-day fast, faced east to ingest the talisman, and beheld the gods of the Three Regions and Eight Radiant Ones within his body. The twenty-four diagrams of golden script and jade graphs appeared luminously in the void, their radiant colors and brilliance boundless, their intricate details naturally unfolding.

At that moment, he summoned the immortal overseer of the diagrams to render them in illustration. Golden script and purple characters, jade texts and cinnabar verses—thus were the sounds formed. From the Supreme Nine-Light Perfected Lady of the Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen, the Eastern and Western Twin Flowers, the Northern and Southern Perfected Lords, the immortals of the Five Peaks, and the Pure Void Perfected Ones, all received the true texts. These were the very diagrams drawn by the Later Sage, each duly appended.

---

**Diagram of the Perfected One Bathing in the Eastern Well**
*First True Qi of the Upper Region*
The Celestial River pours into the Eastern Well,
Stone radiance and the essence of the Water Mother.
A halo brushes the numinous brilliance,
Dark splendor gleams in lofty clarity.
The Primordial Beginning parts the layered night,
Heavenly beings follow the moon’s birth.
Bathing atop the Orchid Pool,
Dragons bear the long-stemmed vase.
Golden youths scatter fragrant blossoms,
Jade maidens stream the Five Stars.
Crowns and sashes laved in jade fluid,
Refining and transmuting the forms of the Five Immortals.
Their bodies fragrant, myriad spirits descend,
Riding the radiance to ascend the heights of purity.

**Diagram of the True Forms of the Five Peaks Immortals**
*Second True Qi of the Upper Region*
Wondrous is the Dao of the Primordial Beginning,
The Five Numinous Ones unfold the true script.
Above, it opens the Dragon Han kalpa,
Resplendent, the Three Radiant Ones divide.
Ten divisions of flying celestial texts
Securely settle the gods of the Five Thearchs.
The numinous peaks uphold the Dark Palace,
Billowing and surging, they exhale treasure clouds.
Above dwells the qi of deathlessness,
Sprouting buds to refine the Five Immortals.
Jade mushrooms bestowed within the dark,
Their bodies pure, naturally fragrant.
With concentrated thought, the lofty numinous descends,
Consorting with the Lords of the Supreme Emperor.

**Diagram of the Eight Histories Unlocking the Numinous**
*Third True Qi of the Upper Region*
Three radiant ones exhale numinous blossoms,
Dazzling, the Eight Gates open.
Within abides the spirit of wisdom,
Clad in flying celestial robes.
The Eight Histories convey the numinous qi,
Jade talismans penetrate the subtle and profound.
Treasure clouds reflect jade graphs,
Mighty beasts shake celestial might.
Resplendent, the Eight Assemblies’ palaces,
In profusion, numinous beings take flight.
With concentrated thought, summon the true qi,
Five talismans generate radiant splendor.
The Eight Radiant Ones wield jade tablets,
Ascending the void to enter the Purple Tenuity.

**Diagram of the Six Jia Immortals Communing with the Numinous**
*Fourth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Numinous palace flying celestial maidens,
Six Perfected Ones feast in Eternal Yang.
Embracing the sun, bearing the bright moon,
They tread upward toward the Three Dawn Lights.
Communing with the numinous, they fathom the subtle,
Penetratingly observing the ten directions’ clarity.
Summoning the natural kitchens,
The Five Mushrooms and Six Palaces flourish.
Transforming and refining the myriad spirits,
Their forms divide, their true countenances change.
Treading the void, they pace the Dark Capital,
Soaring high to enter the Empty Union.
At times descending as golden aurora beings,
Loosening their robes in the Three-Pure Chambers.
Holding contracts, they wield flying canopies,
Carefree, they ascend the Jade Capital.

**Diagram of the Nine Palaces and Purple Chambers**
*Fifth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Purple chambers reflect lofty purity,
Palaces and halls mutually support one another.
Layered mists entwine sun and moon,
Flying immortals shade the Great Void.
The utmost Perfected and Great Sages,
Serene, chant the feathered scriptures.
Opening salvation through the kalpas of all heavens,
As countless as the Ganges’ sands, they complete one cycle.
The Nine-Five firmly secures numinous destiny,
Eternally preserving heaven and earth’s abode.
With concentrated thought, how could one be distant?
The Purple Palace engenders my body.

**Diagram of the Primordial Beginning and Supreme Clarity**
*Sixth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Supreme Clarity knows no bounds,
Azure qi billows in the Purple Tenuity.
Numinous winds swiftly bear treasures,
How lush the forest of jade trees!
Purple phoenixes sing on long branches,
Dragon-unicorns intertwine in flight.
The Supreme surveys the ten directions,
All heavens array their dharma robes.
Wandering, they circle the palace city,
Thrice encircling, the long night opens.
If one can contemplate the numinous qi,
One shall naturally ride the radiance in flight.

**Diagram of the Perfected Dao’s Primal Chaos**
*Seventh True Qi of the Upper Region*
Vast and boundless, the Primordial Beginning’s dawn,
Primal chaos’ qi yet undivided.
Three hues transform within the void,
Revolving and merging like auspicious clouds.
From the dark and obscure, true radiance arises,
Resplendent, the numinous script unfolds.
Brilliantly, the long night opens,
Establishing the roots of heaven and earth.
The wondrous true qi of spontaneity,
Pure and abiding, qi endures.
Circulating through the Great Nine Realms,
Opening salvation through the gates of all heavens.

**Diagram of the Western Ascent and Preservation Register**
*Eighth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Riding the swift numinous qi,
Mounting the radiance to ascend the Western Palace.
Arriving at the Jade That Realm,
Ten thousand chariots follow in attendance.
Spirits and demons bow in submission,
Celestial Kings all surrender in homage.
Dividing gold to cast the orthodox Dharma,
The world reveres the King of Dao and Virtue.
Thus bestowing the orthodox true qi,
Distinctly named to deliver one region.
At that time, a Dao-endowed world arose,
Called the Hall of Blessed Virtue.

The *Numinous Treasure Diagram of the Immortals* states: The Eight True Spirit Diagrams of the Upper Region, through the primordial qi of the Grotto-Heavens and the Primordial Beginning, transform and engender the Eight Radiant Upper Perfected Ones. Within the human body, they bring forth the Upper Prime’s generative qi. With concentrated thought within, the Eight Perfected manifest their forms—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, conveying radiant clouds to bear one upward in ascent.

The First Radiant Spirit of the Brain is named Awakened Origin, styled Zidaodu, of white color, bearing the First Radiant Jade Talisman, the First Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Hair is named Mystic Celestial Flower, styled Daoheng, of dark color, bearing the Second Radiant Jade Talisman, the Second Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Third Radiant Spirit of the Skin is named Penetrating Multitudes, styled Daolian, of yellow color, bearing the Third Radiant Jade Talisman, the Third Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Eyes is named Spirit Bell Birth, styled Daotong, of five colors, bearing the Fourth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Cervical Marrow is named Spirit Plan Cover, styled Daozhou, of white color, bearing the Fifth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Shoulders is named Beneficial Calendar Turn, styled Daozhu, of white jade color, bearing the Sixth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Nose is named Soaring Dragon Jade, styled Daowei, of blue-white-yellow three colors, bearing the Seventh Radiant Jade Talisman, the Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Tongue is named Primordial Beam Serene, styled Daoqi, of red color, bearing the Eighth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The *Diagram of the Immortals* states: The Eight Radiant Spirit Jade Talismans, through the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven’s natural qi, govern the Upper Prime’s Eight Radiant Spirits, stationed within the Upper Prime Palace of the human body. After ingesting them for eight years, the Eight Radiant Spirits manifest their forms, enabling one to comprehend the subtle and profound. With penetrating vision of the natural, one may sit or stand at will, vanish or appear, summon celestial immortals, and ascend in broad daylight—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, clouds bearing feathered canopies.

---

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Penetration of the Subtle and Transcendent Transformations*
**Middle Division: First True Qi**

The wondrous Dao bears no image,
Its qi congeals to form the lofty Perfected.
Binding emptiness, it naturally arises,
Its numinous transformations revealing the Three Spirits.
At dawn, it draws the essence of the Five Stars,
Midday, it imbibes the sun’s central nectar.
At dusk, it feasts on the yellow moon’s splendor,
Reclining to refine the Five Immortals.
Transforming radiance follows empty change,
Instantly standing in the natural.

*Diagram of the Immortals Treading the Nine Heavens*
**Middle Division: Second True Qi**

The ethereal qi of the Nine Heavens,
Clear and limpid, inherently profound.
Auspicious clouds veil the layered void,
Golden towers bear the purple mist.
Within lies the Palace of the Great Ultimate,
Where the Lord of the Dao arrays the great thousand.
Azure groves fill with myriad chants,
The ten directions all with flying immortals.
The Southern Mound’s Hall of Blessed Virtue,
Four seats all of pure guests.
Scattering blossoms to celebrate my vow,
Carefree, without waves or ford.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Nine Transformations*
**Middle Division: Third True Qi**

Wondrous transformations arise from empty resonance,
Focused thought connects to the utmost numinous.
Above, it consumes the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Guiding and refining the essence of the Five Clouds.
Three days to refine the myriad spirits,
One day to transform nine forms.
Shedding the body to roam the nine realms,
Playfully traversing the courts of the Three Realms.
Riding radiance to gaze upon the Great Simplicity,
Numinous winds turn the green carriage.
Flying mists encircle the ten absolutes,
Yellow banners summon the myriad spirits.
The heavens descend with feathered regalia,
Lushly entering the Upper Clarity.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Constant Preservation*
**Middle Division: Fourth True Qi**

A single thought summons the hidden Perfected,
Focused stillness—spirits naturally return.
When the drip of the clepsydra ceases, external responses fade,
The upright qi itself becomes serene and subtle.
Accumulated resonance draws the wondrous Perfected,
The Six Palaces generate radiance.
Mysterious union harmonizes with empty mutuality,
The myriad spirits respond in unison.
The Eight Radiant Spirits support the cloud canopy,
Resplendent and swift, their feathered regalia.
Bearing me beyond the Great Brahmā,
Carefree, soaring through the void.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Guarding the One and Nurturing the Body*
**Middle Division: Fifth True Qi**

Guide and refine the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Rub the hands to comfort the body’s form.
Block the paths of deviant demons,
Polish and adorn to refine luminosity.
Phoenix soars to connect true qi,
Dragon leaps to command the myriad spirits.
At dawn, the host of Perfected assemble,
Nurturing the body to awaken spirit’s birth.
Serene and detached, return to guarding the One,
Still thought—upright qi abides.
Spirits complete, radiance naturally flies,
Ascending to enter the Upper Clarity.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Guarding the Spirit and Embracing Radiance*
**Middle Division: Sixth True Qi**

The Mud-Pellet Palace houses the hun and po,
The Middle Prime embraces the One Palace.
The Cinnabar Field—Threefold Numinous Mansion,
Blending to engender the Spirit King.
The Three Passes govern the Nine Heavens,
Inhaling and exhaling the light of sun and moon.
The Five Stars’ profound mystery nourishes,
Flowing to fill the Six Stomachs.
Still thought—myriad qi return,
Spirits at peace, form also flourishing.
The Three Divisions’ Eight Radiant Perfected,
Bearing me into the great void.
Long abiding through heaven and earth’s kalpas,
With the Primordial Beginning, eternally without end.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Silent Nurturing of Essence and Guarding the Will*
**Middle Division: Seventh True Qi**

At dawn, consume the Five Stars,
Focus thought on the Mud-Pellet Spirit.
At the center, swallow the sun’s light,
Silently chant to warm the Crimson Palace.
At dusk, guide the moon’s essence,
Irrigating the Lord of the Cinnabar Field.
Three Perfected generate one radiance,
Transformations—form naturally distinct.
At once, the myriad spirits return,
Gathering qi, radiance soars aloft.
Ascending to the palaces of sun and moon,
Exiting and entering, observing the Eight Gates.
Through the Dragon Han’s endless kalpas,
Wondrous indeed, the Numinous Treasure scriptures.

*Diagram of the Mushroom Maidens*
**Middle Division: Eighth True Qi**

Floating, the scattered numinous qi,
Mushroom blossoms follow the wind’s turn.
The heavens shower fragrant blossoms,
Sun and moon bathe in numinous splendor.
Jade maidens hold golden platters,
Brilliant, soaring through the void.
Gazing upward, I think of the Perfected’s descent,
Swallowing the mushroom to open the Five Spirits.
Guiding and refining—luminosity pierces,
Through ten thousand kalpas, the body does not decay.

The *Numinous Treasure Diagram of the Immortals* states: The Eight True Spirit Diagrams of the Middle Division, through the Primordial Beginning’s Numinous Treasure Grotto-Mystery qi, transform and engender the Middle Division’s Eight Radiant Spirits. Within the human body’s Middle Prime Palace, they bring forth the Middle Prime’s generative qi. With focused thought for eight years, the Eight Perfected manifest their radiance—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, conveying the immortals’ feathered canopy to soar through the great void.

The First Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Throat is named Hundred Streams Release, styled Daotong, of nine colors, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s First Radiant True Talisman, the First Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Diaphragm is named Pure Spirit Birth, styled Daoping, of white color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Second Radiant True Soaring Talisman, the Second Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Third Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Heart is named Radiant Yang Prosperity, styled Daoming, of red color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Third Radiant True Talisman, the Third Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Liver is named Opening Lord Lad, styled Daoqing, of blue-green color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Fourth Radiant True Talisman, the Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Gallbladder is named Dragon Virtue Restrainer, styled Daofang, of blue-green-yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Fifth Radiant True Talisman, the Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Left Kidney is named Spring Prime Straightness, styled Daoqing, clad in five colors, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Sixth Radiant True Talisman, the Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Right Kidney is named Image of No-Other Prime, styled Daosheng, of white-black color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Seventh Radiant True Talisman, the Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Spleen is named Treasure Prime Command, styled Daoqian, of pure yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Eighth Radiant True Talisman, the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The *Immortals’ Charts* states: The Numinous Treasure Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Eight Radiant True Talismans, by which the eight radiant spirit-truths of the central division are arrayed, are stationed within the Middle Prime Palace of the human body. By ingesting them for eight years, the Middle Prime’s eight radiant spirits manifest their forms, enabling one to commune with spirits and penetrate the numinous, to gaze through the eight directions, to partake of spirit mushrooms and jade nectar, of five qi cloud-sprouts, to radiate light from the body, and to ride with the immortals through the great void.

*Immortals’ Six Yin Jade Maidens Chart*
**First True Qi of the Lower Division**
The numinous consort shines in the Grand Tenuity,
The jade maiden, emerald and vermilion jasper.
Graceful, she soars forth from empty space,
Wafting, borne on the void’s arising.
Mysterious and wondrous, the qi of spontaneity,
The six yin rest in their constant forms.
With distant longing, I yearn for a fine encounter,
Gazing upward, I await the descent of the Six Dings.
Within the golden chamber of radiance she leads me,
Gentle and yielding, tender in spirit’s passion.
The dark resonance comes seeking of itself—
How could I have foreseen form or name?
Transformations arise from concentrated emanation,
Responding to echoes, the spirit’s own numinosity.

*Immortals’ Nine Prime Dao-Guiding Chart*
**Second True Qi of the Lower Division**
King Qing illuminates the Dark Metropolis,
Ten sages revolve through the Purple Tenuity.
Immortals emerge, clad in trailing clouds,
In profusion, streaming with feathered robes.
Fragrant blossoms scatter on the wind,
The ten heavens ride the void in flight.
The cinnabar empyrean reflects the light canopy,
Sun and moon bathe in radiant splendor.
Gazing upward, I long for the wondrous truth’s descent—
The spirit’s resonance returns through the heart’s devotion.

*Immortals’ Dao-Yin Chart*
**Third True Qi of the Lower Division**
Luxuriant, the five cloud-mushrooms,
Dark radiance spills forth jade light.
Congealed essences fill the numinous palace,
Lingering between the palaces of sun and moon.
Five hues order the lofty perfected,
Flowing essence irrigates the ten directions.
Breathing without wearying,
Flying heavenward alongside golden countenances.
Guiding and drawing in the spirit’s qi,
The dark nourishment fills the six stomachs.
With concentrated thought, resonance comes swiftly—
Calmly seated, one beholds the void as one.

*Immortals’ Grotto’s Vast Guardian Chart*
**Fourth True Qi of the Lower Division**
Ingesting qi to order the Great Mystery,
In quietude, the host of perfected dwell.
Below, they govern the famed mountains,
In grotto-chambers, clear and empty.
Five colors illumine sun and moon,
Their ranks arrayed as the immortals’ store.
Above, they govern the Purple Tenuity Palace,
Compiling the celestial treasure texts.
Within, a guardian of unity abides,
With concentrated thought, awaiting the chart’s unveiling.
The Five Elders oversee the demonic trials—
With a steadfast heart, joy arises of itself.
The body traverses the palaces of water and fire,
The name enters the nine heavens’ abodes.
Fortunate is the one who holds fast—
Thus attaining to ride the radiant chariot.

*Immortals’ Transformations and Concealments Chart*
**Fifth True Qi of the Lower Division**
Transformations arise within the empty void,
The five phases elude bodily form.
With profound thought, the qi of spontaneity,
The essences of metal, wood, water, and fire.
Earth becomes the palace of concealment,
The six subjugations contain the courtyard of radiance.
Jade maidens transform their raiment,
Laozi and Zhuangzi respond to echoes.
Subtly entering within the finest hairs,
Vastly embracing the mountains and peaks’ numinosity.
Cultivating the spirit herbs that bridge the Dao,
The body ranks alongside the Eight Histories.
Myriad transformations follow desire,
Carefree, one may delight the heart.

*Immortals’ Mushroom-Gathering and Mountain-Opening Chart*
**Sixth True Qi of the Lower Division**
The numinous peaks rise in towering majesty,
Emerald mounds ascend to the radiant empyrean.
Five mushrooms flourish on the dark ridges,
Immortal herbs thrive on frost-kissed branches.
Above, gather those who pluck them,
Clad in feathered robes, wafting on the wind.
The numinous grotto opens after ten thousand kalpas,
In a single radiance, all heavens converge.
Attaining the wondrous, one rests in awakened stillness—
As countless as the Ganges’ sands, yet like a single dawn.

*Immortals’ Luminous Mirror Chart*
**Seventh True Qi of the Lower Division**
Subtle acuity generates majestic light,
Flowing radiance illumines the eight obscurities.
Penetrating within square and round,
Communing with the perfected, distinguishing ghostly essences.
Spontaneously observing the heavy yin,
Illuminating the forms of heaven and humanity.
Subduing demons to summon immortals,
Transforming to enter the Purple Court.

*Immortals’ Boundless Great One Chart*
**Eighth True Qi of the Lower Division**
Resplendent, the Emperor’s One Truth,
The body clad in dragon and phoenix robes.
Majestic light penetrates the nine heavens,
Brilliant illumination fills the great park’s expanse.
Above, it governs the qi of all heavens,
Becoming the lord of ten thousand immortals.
Lofty, the ultimate Dao’s lineage,
Vast, the great model’s gate.

The *Numinous Treasure Immortals’ Charts* states: The Eight True Spirit Charts of the Lower Division, transformed by the Primordial Beginning’s Numinous Treasure Grotto-Mystery qi, give rise to the eight radiant spirits of the lower division, stationed within the Lower Prime Palace of the human body, conveying the Lower Prime’s generative qi. With eight years of concentrated thought, the Lower Prime’s eight true spirits dispatch ten thousand riders, bearing the immortals’ feathered canopy to carry one together into the Seven Treasures Grove.

The First Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Stomach is named Same as Zhu Yu, styled Daozhan, of yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s First Radiant Numinous Talisman, the First Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Exhausted Intestines is named Omen of Rising Health, styled Daohuan, of yellow-red color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Second Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Second Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Third Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Large and Small Intestines is named Vast Delivery Remnant, styled Daochu, of red-yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Third Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Third Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Torso Center is named Receiving Thick Abundance, styled Daoxu, of nine colors, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Fourth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Chest Diaphragm is named Vast Radiance Dwelling, styled Daochong, of white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Fifth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Two Flanks is named Warding Off Falsehood and Horse Rising, styled Daocheng, of red-white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Sixth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Left Yang is named Supporting Flow, styled Daogui, of blue-green-yellow-white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Seventh Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Right Yin is named Embracing Clarity, styled Daosheng, of blue-green-yellow-white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Eighth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The *Illustrated Charts of Divine Immortals* states: The Numinous Treasure Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Eighth Radiant Numinous Talisman, by virtue of the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Division’s perfection, is enshrined within the Lower Prime Palace of the human body. After ingesting it for eight years, the Eight Radiant Spirits of the Lower Prime manifest in form, nurturing essence and replenishing qi, refining marrow and coagulating perfection. The body radiates luminous splendor, and the Eight Radiant Spirits ascend upon clouds, bearing one aloft in flight.

*The Jade Purity Seven Treasures Illustrated Charts of Divine Immortals* encompasses the Three Eights’ Division of True Qi:
---
Softly, softly, atop the Three Clarities,
Perfection congeals in the Great Canopy of Heaven.
Jade groves on the Emerald Mystery Terrace,
Sun and moon gleam in the Numinous Pavilion.
Flying immortals in verdant qi,
Riding the radiance, trailing purple mists.
Lushly they emerge through clouds,
In throngs arrayed as numinous immortals.
Carefree in the Seven Treasures Grove,
Five hues warm gold and silver.
Donning echoes, the assembly of perfected beings gathers,
Numinous hymns celebrate the myriad spirits.
With concentrated intent on the Three Eights’ Radiance,
One strides beyond to ascend the Gate of Heaven.
---

In the first year of the Vermilion Brightness, on the first *yin* day of the first month, at the hour of noon, the heavens shone with fourfold brilliance, purple clouds coiled through the sky, the Eight Assemblies of the Empyrean rejoiced, numinous winds swept away dust, sun and moon exhaled radiance, the five stars poured forth their essences, heaven and earth were steeped in twilight mists, fragrant blossoms rained down, rivers and seas stilled, mountains and peaks concealed their vapors. The Five Sufferings were all dissolved, the Three Paths released their souls, the Nine Dark Realms ceased their torments, the gates of eternal night swung open, the deaf and blind regained hearing and sight, the Six Afflictions were all healed, the Earth Treasury unsealed, gold and jade revealed their forms, white bones quickened with qi, decayed remains returned to life, dragon scales leapt and danced, birds and beasts soared in joy. The Three Realms knew enduring bliss, humans and spirits rejoiced as one.

On this day of great celebration, the myriad kalpas were renewed. The Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning extended his hospitality upon the Jade Terrace. In the Vermilion Brightness Heaven, upon the Southern Fire Peak, within the Cinnabar Numinous Grotto Palace, he unfurled the Five Colors, fashioned an altar of yellow gold, and spread a foundation of white silver. The Seven Treasures proclaimed the numinous, and he transmitted the *Cavern Mystery Golden Writ of the Purple Script and Vermilion Chapters of Spontaneous Numinous Charts*, along with the Twenty-Four Perfected and the Three Divisions’ Radiant Spirits, the Heavenly Immortals, Flying Immortals, Divine Immortals, and Earthbound Immortals, their legions of troops and mounts, to the Supreme Peerless Dao Lord. Following the solemn protocols and mysterious statutes, he illuminated the true ordinances and scriptures, initiating ninety-nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine individuals whose names were inscribed in gold, whose characters were arrayed across the heavens—those destined to ascend as immortals.

At the conclusion of the great kalpic cycle, the texts shall be gathered and returned to the Seven Treasures Mysterious Terrace of the Great Canopy’s Purple Tenuity Palace. Now, as the Three Caverns govern the kalpic flow and the Numinous Treasure’s Lower Teaching prevails, the vacancies among the celestial offices of the ascending immortals must first be filled by those of middling worth to complete the ranks of the Black Emperor’s Perfected of the Nine Heavens.

The Master of the Northern Peak, Lord Ju, formerly received the teachings in the *Xu* year, on the thirteenth day of the ninth month, at the Southern Grotto of the Central Heaven, from the Master of the Central Peak, Lord Yang. As he was destined to initiate others, those whose names were preordained in the golden registers and jade records, whose natures aligned with perfection, were to be selected to fill the celestial offices, traversing the Eight Poles and arriving from the midst of the Void.

Now, the destined life of the Vermilion Emperor’s Perfected, so-and-so, born in the *bing-wu* year, whose fate is governed by the Southern Emperor of the Cinnabar Heaven, born in the seventh month, imbued with the primordial qi of the Plain Heaven’s destiny, whose bones and fate align with the immortal perfected, is to fill the office of Second-Rank Immortal of the Cavern Mystery. In this year, on such-and-such a day of such-and-such a month, within such-and-such a heaven, in accordance with the ancient ordinances of the former master’s luminous and true great method, he ascends the Yellow Altar. The Seven Treasures secure the numinous, the Five Colors attest to his immortality, and he is initiated into the boundless *Spontaneous Numinous Treasure Cavern Mystery Golden Writ*, the *Purple Script and Vermilion Chapters of Jade Text*, the *Charts of the Twenty-Four Perfected and Three Eights’ Divisions*, and the divine immortals’ mounts.

Having received the great method, he is acclaimed by the Three Realms. The numinous demons safeguard his clarity, his person traverses the Five Paths, his name is inscribed in the Golden Tablets and Jade Records of the Purple Palace. His rank ascends to Perfected Immortal, and he roams freely, clad in the celestial regalia of feathered robes. He ascends upon clouds, borne by dragon-drawn chariots, preceded by the Three Sevens’ colored standards, heralded by phoenix songs, followed by the Heavenly Chime. The Five Emperors open the Way, the Supreme Ultimate attends his chariot, immortal youths and jade maidens scatter blossoms and burn incense, jeweled canopies trail their tassels, encircling and protecting his journey. Harmonious qi fills him to abundance, and he ascends to the immortal palaces.

He must observe proper conduct in movement and stillness, guard his speech, and be vigilant in his actions. He must cast aside all worldly entanglements, sever extraneous thoughts, calm his mind, and embrace silence, focusing his will solely upon the method. He must not allow turbidity, nor incite others to distraction, lest he disrupt the true qi. In all his actions, he must practice great compassion, broadly delivering all beings, ensuring the nation’s peace and the people’s prosperity, unifying the Four Seas in tranquility. His seven generations of ancestors and parents shall all ascend and be delivered, his person shall enter luminosity, and he shall be reborn early among humankind. When the great kalpic cycle turns, he shall ascend together to the Supreme Clarity, carefree in the Seven Treasures Grove of the Golden Portals.

Those not yet initiated as immortals must complete seven years of the method’s practice, until their celestial qi is fully prepared. When the celestial signs proclaim that one’s destiny aligns with perfection, the transmission shall proceed in accordance with the ordinances. If one lacks numinous resonance, the teachings must not be disseminated for forty thousand kalpas. Should one betray the covenant or leak the sacred texts, their parents in life and death shall be eternally confined to the dark night, and their person shall perish amidst the Five Paths’ winds and blades for ten thousand kalpas.

Without daring to speak further, he adheres to the ordinances and upholds the precepts, uniting with the immortal host in life and death, all in accordance with the *Luminous and True Scriptures*.

chunks.original_text: 太玄八景箓 经名：太玄八景箓。 撰人不详，约出於南北朝。 前半篇为二十四真图，后半篇为仙真符箓。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞真部方法类。 太玄八景箓 上皇元年九月二日，后圣李君出游西河，历观八方。 值元始天王乘八景玉舆，驾九色玄龙，三素飞云，导从群仙，手把华旛，狮子白鹤，啸歌邕邕，浮空而来，同会西河之上。 李君稽首，请问天王：昔蒙训授天书玉字二十四图，虽得其文，未究妙章，虽有图赞，而无其像，修之庵霭，妙理难详。 今遇天尊，喜庆难言，愿垂成就，极其道真。 於是使清斋千日，五香熏体，东向服符。 子形神备见，自当洞达，诸疑顿了。 李君稽首，奉承教旨，具依天仪，长斋千日，东向服符，三部八景神并见身中，金书玉字二十四图，空中而明，文彩光鲜，洞彻无穷，罗缕自然。 是时即命主图上仙，而画图焉。 金书紫字，玉文丹章，於此成音。 自南极上元九光太真王夫人、东西二华、南北真公、五岳神仙、清虚真人所受真文，并是后圣所画图像，而各系之焉。 真人沐浴东井图 上部第一真气 天河灌东井，石景水母精。 圆光拂灵曜，玄晖莹高明。 元始披重夜，天人逐月生。 沐浴兰池上，龙负长梗缾。 金童洒香华，玉女流五星。 冠带濯玉津，炼度五仙形。 体香万神降，乘景登高清。 神仙五岳真形图 上部第二真气 妙哉元始道，五灵敷真文。 上开龙汉劫，焕烂三景分。 十部飞天书，安镇五帝神。 灵岳承玄宫，郁勃吐宝云。 上有不死气，殖牙练五仙。 玉芝玄中与，体洁自生熏。 精思高灵降，交游上帝君。 通灵决精八史图 上部第三真气 三景吐灵华，晃朗八门开。 中有智慧神，被服飞天衣。 八史通灵气，玉符洞精微。 宝云映玉字，巨兽振天威。 焕烂八会宫，纷纷灵人飞。 精思招真气，五符生光辉。 八景策玉举，登空入紫微。 神仙六甲通灵图 上部第四真气 灵宫飞天女，六真宴常阳。 抱日负明月，仰蹑三晨光。 通灵究幽微，洞观朗十方。 招致自然厨，五芝六府昌。 变化练万神，分形改正容。 乘虚步玄都，高奔入空同。 时降金霄人，解衿三素房。 携契策飞盖，逍遥升玉京。 神仙九宫紫房图 上部第五真气 紫房映高清，宫室互相扶。 沓烟绕日月，飞天翳太虚。 至真大圣众，萧条咏羽书。 开度诸天劫，恒沙始一周。 九五固灵运，长保天地居。 精思安能远，紫宫生我躯。 元始太清图 上部第六真气 太清无边际，青气郁紫微。 灵风迅士宝，琳树何萋萋。 紫凤呜长条，龙驎交横驰。 太上观十方，诸天整法衣。 游行绕宫城，三周长夜开。 若能思灵气，自得乘景飞。 神仙真道混成图 上部第七真气 荡荡元始初，混沌气未分。 三色无中化，回合若庆云。 幽冥生真景，焕落敷灵文。 豁朗开长夜，植立天地根。 自然妙真气，淳淳气长存。 运通大九界，开度诸天门。 神仙西升保录图 上部第八真气。 乘运迅灵气，驾景升西宫。 之造玉那国，万乘来相从。 神魔稽首伏，天王并归降。 分金范正法，世恭道德王。 故施正真气，别号度一方。 是时有道世，称曰福德堂。 灵宝神仙图曰：上部八真神图，以洞天元始之气，化生自然八景上真，在人身中致上元生气，精心内思，八真见形，千乘万骑，运致景云，载人上升。
chunks.translated_text:
*The Supreme Mystery of the Eight Radiant Registers*

**Title:** *The Supreme Mystery of the Eight Radiant Registers*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties. The first half contains the *Twenty-Four True Diagrams*, while the latter half comprises talismans of the immortals. One scroll. Base text from: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, *Methods* section of the *Dongzhen* Department.

---

**The Supreme Mystery of the Eight Radiant Registers**

In the first year of the Supreme August Era, on the second day of the ninth month, the Later Sage Lord Li journeyed to the Western River. Surveying the eight directions, he encountered the Primordial Celestial King riding an eight-radiance jade chariot, drawn by nine-hued dark dragons and three-pure flying clouds. Preceded by a procession of immortals, they bore flowered banners, while lions and white cranes chanted harmoniously, floating through the void to assemble above the Western River.

Lord Li bowed deeply and inquired of the Celestial King: "Formerly, I received the celestial script and jade graphs of the twenty-four diagrams, yet though I grasped their text, I did not fathom their wondrous verses. Though diagrams and eulogies exist, their forms remain absent—practicing them in obscurity, their profound principles elude clarity. Now, encountering the Heavenly Worthy, my joy is beyond words. I humbly beseech your completion of this Way, that its truth may be perfected."

Thereupon, he was instructed to purify himself with a thousand-day fast, suffuse his body with five fragrances, and face east to ingest the talisman. Once his form and spirit were fully manifested, all would become thoroughly illuminated, and every doubt instantly resolved.

Lord Li bowed again, reverently accepting the celestial decree. Strictly adhering to the heavenly rites, he observed a thousand-day fast, faced east to ingest the talisman, and beheld the gods of the Three Regions and Eight Radiant Ones within his body. The twenty-four diagrams of golden script and jade graphs appeared luminously in the void, their radiant colors and brilliance boundless, their intricate details naturally unfolding.

At that moment, he summoned the immortal overseer of the diagrams to render them in illustration. Golden script and purple characters, jade texts and cinnabar verses—thus were the sounds formed. From the Supreme Nine-Light Perfected Lady of the Upper Prime of the Southern Culmen, the Eastern and Western Twin Flowers, the Northern and Southern Perfected Lords, the immortals of the Five Peaks, and the Pure Void Perfected Ones, all received the true texts. These were the very diagrams drawn by the Later Sage, each duly appended.

---

**Diagram of the Perfected One Bathing in the Eastern Well**
*First True Qi of the Upper Region*
The Celestial River pours into the Eastern Well,
Stone radiance and the essence of the Water Mother.
A halo brushes the numinous brilliance,
Dark splendor gleams in lofty clarity.
The Primordial Beginning parts the layered night,
Heavenly beings follow the moon’s birth.
Bathing atop the Orchid Pool,
Dragons bear the long-stemmed vase.
Golden youths scatter fragrant blossoms,
Jade maidens stream the Five Stars.
Crowns and sashes laved in jade fluid,
Refining and transmuting the forms of the Five Immortals.
Their bodies fragrant, myriad spirits descend,
Riding the radiance to ascend the heights of purity.

**Diagram of the True Forms of the Five Peaks Immortals**
*Second True Qi of the Upper Region*
Wondrous is the Dao of the Primordial Beginning,
The Five Numinous Ones unfold the true script.
Above, it opens the Dragon Han kalpa,
Resplendent, the Three Radiant Ones divide.
Ten divisions of flying celestial texts
Securely settle the gods of the Five Thearchs.
The numinous peaks uphold the Dark Palace,
Billowing and surging, they exhale treasure clouds.
Above dwells the qi of deathlessness,
Sprouting buds to refine the Five Immortals.
Jade mushrooms bestowed within the dark,
Their bodies pure, naturally fragrant.
With concentrated thought, the lofty numinous descends,
Consorting with the Lords of the Supreme Emperor.

**Diagram of the Eight Histories Unlocking the Numinous**
*Third True Qi of the Upper Region*
Three radiant ones exhale numinous blossoms,
Dazzling, the Eight Gates open.
Within abides the spirit of wisdom,
Clad in flying celestial robes.
The Eight Histories convey the numinous qi,
Jade talismans penetrate the subtle and profound.
Treasure clouds reflect jade graphs,
Mighty beasts shake celestial might.
Resplendent, the Eight Assemblies’ palaces,
In profusion, numinous beings take flight.
With concentrated thought, summon the true qi,
Five talismans generate radiant splendor.
The Eight Radiant Ones wield jade tablets,
Ascending the void to enter the Purple Tenuity.

**Diagram of the Six Jia Immortals Communing with the Numinous**
*Fourth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Numinous palace flying celestial maidens,
Six Perfected Ones feast in Eternal Yang.
Embracing the sun, bearing the bright moon,
They tread upward toward the Three Dawn Lights.
Communing with the numinous, they fathom the subtle,
Penetratingly observing the ten directions’ clarity.
Summoning the natural kitchens,
The Five Mushrooms and Six Palaces flourish.
Transforming and refining the myriad spirits,
Their forms divide, their true countenances change.
Treading the void, they pace the Dark Capital,
Soaring high to enter the Empty Union.
At times descending as golden aurora beings,
Loosening their robes in the Three-Pure Chambers.
Holding contracts, they wield flying canopies,
Carefree, they ascend the Jade Capital.

**Diagram of the Nine Palaces and Purple Chambers**
*Fifth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Purple chambers reflect lofty purity,
Palaces and halls mutually support one another.
Layered mists entwine sun and moon,
Flying immortals shade the Great Void.
The utmost Perfected and Great Sages,
Serene, chant the feathered scriptures.
Opening salvation through the kalpas of all heavens,
As countless as the Ganges’ sands, they complete one cycle.
The Nine-Five firmly secures numinous destiny,
Eternally preserving heaven and earth’s abode.
With concentrated thought, how could one be distant?
The Purple Palace engenders my body.

**Diagram of the Primordial Beginning and Supreme Clarity**
*Sixth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Supreme Clarity knows no bounds,
Azure qi billows in the Purple Tenuity.
Numinous winds swiftly bear treasures,
How lush the forest of jade trees!
Purple phoenixes sing on long branches,
Dragon-unicorns intertwine in flight.
The Supreme surveys the ten directions,
All heavens array their dharma robes.
Wandering, they circle the palace city,
Thrice encircling, the long night opens.
If one can contemplate the numinous qi,
One shall naturally ride the radiance in flight.

**Diagram of the Perfected Dao’s Primal Chaos**
*Seventh True Qi of the Upper Region*
Vast and boundless, the Primordial Beginning’s dawn,
Primal chaos’ qi yet undivided.
Three hues transform within the void,
Revolving and merging like auspicious clouds.
From the dark and obscure, true radiance arises,
Resplendent, the numinous script unfolds.
Brilliantly, the long night opens,
Establishing the roots of heaven and earth.
The wondrous true qi of spontaneity,
Pure and abiding, qi endures.
Circulating through the Great Nine Realms,
Opening salvation through the gates of all heavens.

**Diagram of the Western Ascent and Preservation Register**
*Eighth True Qi of the Upper Region*
Riding the swift numinous qi,
Mounting the radiance to ascend the Western Palace.
Arriving at the Jade That Realm,
Ten thousand chariots follow in attendance.
Spirits and demons bow in submission,
Celestial Kings all surrender in homage.
Dividing gold to cast the orthodox Dharma,
The world reveres the King of Dao and Virtue.
Thus bestowing the orthodox true qi,
Distinctly named to deliver one region.
At that time, a Dao-endowed world arose,
Called the Hall of Blessed Virtue.

The *Numinous Treasure Diagram of the Immortals* states: The Eight True Spirit Diagrams of the Upper Region, through the primordial qi of the Grotto-Heavens and the Primordial Beginning, transform and engender the Eight Radiant Upper Perfected Ones. Within the human body, they bring forth the Upper Prime’s generative qi. With concentrated thought within, the Eight Perfected manifest their forms—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, conveying radiant clouds to bear one upward in ascent.

chunks.original_text: 第一景脑神，名觉元，字子道都，色白，一景玉符，上元洞天气部一景神。 第二景发神，名玄天华，字道衡，色玄，二景玉符，上元洞天气部二景神。 第三景皮肤神，名通众仲，字道连，色黄，三景玉符，上元洞天气部三景神。 第四景目神，名灵锺生，字道童，五色，四景玉符，上元洞天气部四景神。 第五景项髓神，名灵谟盖，字道周，色白，五景玉符，上元洞天气部五景神。 第六景神，名益历转，字道柱，白玉色，六景玉符，上元洞天气部六景神。 第七景鼻神，名冲龙玉，字道微，青白黄三色，七景玉符，上元洞天气部七景神。 第八景舌神，名始梁崎寂，字道岐，色赤，八景玉符，上元洞天气部八景神。 神仙图曰：八景神真玉符，上元洞天自然之气，以部上元八景，镇在人身上元宫中，服之八年，八景见形，为己通达幽微之事，洞观自然，坐在立亡，降致天仙，千乘万骑，云举羽盖，白日登晨。 神仙通微灵化图 中部第一真气 大道妙无像，运气凝高真。 结空自然生，灵化表三神。 朝引五星精，中噏日中津。 夕餐黄月华，寝卧练五仙。 变景随空化，鲦欻立自然。 神仙蹑虚九天图 中部第二真气 萧萧九天气，清澄自高玄。 庆云翳重虚，金阙承紫烟。 中有太极宫，道君罗大千。 青林弥众梵，十方并飞天。 南陵福德堂，四座皆清宾。 散华庆我愿，逍遥无波津。 神仙九变图 中部第三真气 妙化因空感，专思通至灵。 上食九天气，导引五云精。 三日练万神，一日变九形。 脱身游九域，遨戏三界庭。 乘景望太素，灵风回绿軿。 飞烟绕十绝，黄旛召万灵。 诸天降羽仪，郁郁入上清。 神仙常存图 中部第四真气 点念招幽真，专静神自归。 漏尽外应消，正气自夷微。 积感妙真降，六府生光辉。 玄会空相和，万神应响齐。 八景扶云盖，焕落迅羽仪。 载我大梵外，逍遥乘空飞。 神仙守一养身图 中部第五真气 导引九天气，摩手慰身形。 遏断邪魔径，莹饬练光明。 凤翔通真气，龙超制万灵。 辰旦众真会，养身觉神生。 淡泊还守一，静思正气停。 神备景自飞，高升入上清。 神仙守神含景图 中部第六真气 泥丸置营魄，中元抱一宫。 丹田三灵府，混合生神王。 三阙统九天，呼吸日月光。 五星奥玄滋，流演六胃充。 静思万气归，神安形亦芳。 三部八景真，携我入太空。 长居天地劫，元始永无终。 神仙寂默养精守志图 中部第七真气 清朝餐五星，专思泥丸神。 正中咽日光，默念绛府熏。 黄昏导月精，灌溉丹田君。 三真生一景，变化形自分。 一见万神归，摄气景高奔。 上登日月宫，出入观八门。 龙汉无终劫，妙哉灵宝文。 芝英玉女图 中部第八真气 飘飘散灵气，芝英随风回。 诸天洒香华，日月灌灵晖。 玉女擎金盘，粲粲乘空飞。 仰思真颜降，咽芝五神开。 导引光明彻，万劫体不衰。 灵宝神仙图曰：中部八真神图，以元始灵宝洞玄之气，化生自然中部八景，在人身中中元官中，致中元生气。 精思八年，八真见景，千乘万骑，运致神仙羽盖，飞行太空。 中真一景喉神，名百流放，字道通，九色，洞玄中元一景真符，部一景神。 中真二景胇神，名素灵生，字道平，色白，洞玄中元二景真腾符，部二景神。 中真三景心神，名焕阳昌，字道明，色赤，洞玄中元三景真符，部三景神。
chunks.translated_text:
The First Radiant Spirit of the Brain is named Awakened Origin, styled Zidaodu, of white color, bearing the First Radiant Jade Talisman, the First Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Hair is named Mystic Celestial Flower, styled Daoheng, of dark color, bearing the Second Radiant Jade Talisman, the Second Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Third Radiant Spirit of the Skin is named Penetrating Multitudes, styled Daolian, of yellow color, bearing the Third Radiant Jade Talisman, the Third Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Eyes is named Spirit Bell Birth, styled Daotong, of five colors, bearing the Fourth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Cervical Marrow is named Spirit Plan Cover, styled Daozhou, of white color, bearing the Fifth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Shoulders is named Beneficial Calendar Turn, styled Daozhu, of white jade color, bearing the Sixth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Nose is named Soaring Dragon Jade, styled Daowei, of blue-white-yellow three colors, bearing the Seventh Radiant Jade Talisman, the Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Tongue is named Primordial Beam Serene, styled Daoqi, of red color, bearing the Eighth Radiant Jade Talisman, the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven Qi Division.

The *Diagram of the Immortals* states: The Eight Radiant Spirit Jade Talismans, through the Upper Prime’s Grotto-Heaven’s natural qi, govern the Upper Prime’s Eight Radiant Spirits, stationed within the Upper Prime Palace of the human body. After ingesting them for eight years, the Eight Radiant Spirits manifest their forms, enabling one to comprehend the subtle and profound. With penetrating vision of the natural, one may sit or stand at will, vanish or appear, summon celestial immortals, and ascend in broad daylight—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, clouds bearing feathered canopies.

---

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Penetration of the Subtle and Transcendent Transformations*
**Middle Division: First True Qi**

The wondrous Dao bears no image,
Its qi congeals to form the lofty Perfected.
Binding emptiness, it naturally arises,
Its numinous transformations revealing the Three Spirits.
At dawn, it draws the essence of the Five Stars,
Midday, it imbibes the sun’s central nectar.
At dusk, it feasts on the yellow moon’s splendor,
Reclining to refine the Five Immortals.
Transforming radiance follows empty change,
Instantly standing in the natural.

*Diagram of the Immortals Treading the Nine Heavens*
**Middle Division: Second True Qi**

The ethereal qi of the Nine Heavens,
Clear and limpid, inherently profound.
Auspicious clouds veil the layered void,
Golden towers bear the purple mist.
Within lies the Palace of the Great Ultimate,
Where the Lord of the Dao arrays the great thousand.
Azure groves fill with myriad chants,
The ten directions all with flying immortals.
The Southern Mound’s Hall of Blessed Virtue,
Four seats all of pure guests.
Scattering blossoms to celebrate my vow,
Carefree, without waves or ford.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Nine Transformations*
**Middle Division: Third True Qi**

Wondrous transformations arise from empty resonance,
Focused thought connects to the utmost numinous.
Above, it consumes the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Guiding and refining the essence of the Five Clouds.
Three days to refine the myriad spirits,
One day to transform nine forms.
Shedding the body to roam the nine realms,
Playfully traversing the courts of the Three Realms.
Riding radiance to gaze upon the Great Simplicity,
Numinous winds turn the green carriage.
Flying mists encircle the ten absolutes,
Yellow banners summon the myriad spirits.
The heavens descend with feathered regalia,
Lushly entering the Upper Clarity.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Constant Preservation*
**Middle Division: Fourth True Qi**

A single thought summons the hidden Perfected,
Focused stillness—spirits naturally return.
When the drip of the clepsydra ceases, external responses fade,
The upright qi itself becomes serene and subtle.
Accumulated resonance draws the wondrous Perfected,
The Six Palaces generate radiance.
Mysterious union harmonizes with empty mutuality,
The myriad spirits respond in unison.
The Eight Radiant Spirits support the cloud canopy,
Resplendent and swift, their feathered regalia.
Bearing me beyond the Great Brahmā,
Carefree, soaring through the void.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Guarding the One and Nurturing the Body*
**Middle Division: Fifth True Qi**

Guide and refine the qi of the Nine Heavens,
Rub the hands to comfort the body’s form.
Block the paths of deviant demons,
Polish and adorn to refine luminosity.
Phoenix soars to connect true qi,
Dragon leaps to command the myriad spirits.
At dawn, the host of Perfected assemble,
Nurturing the body to awaken spirit’s birth.
Serene and detached, return to guarding the One,
Still thought—upright qi abides.
Spirits complete, radiance naturally flies,
Ascending to enter the Upper Clarity.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Guarding the Spirit and Embracing Radiance*
**Middle Division: Sixth True Qi**

The Mud-Pellet Palace houses the hun and po,
The Middle Prime embraces the One Palace.
The Cinnabar Field—Threefold Numinous Mansion,
Blending to engender the Spirit King.
The Three Passes govern the Nine Heavens,
Inhaling and exhaling the light of sun and moon.
The Five Stars’ profound mystery nourishes,
Flowing to fill the Six Stomachs.
Still thought—myriad qi return,
Spirits at peace, form also flourishing.
The Three Divisions’ Eight Radiant Perfected,
Bearing me into the great void.
Long abiding through heaven and earth’s kalpas,
With the Primordial Beginning, eternally without end.

*Diagram of the Immortals’ Silent Nurturing of Essence and Guarding the Will*
**Middle Division: Seventh True Qi**

At dawn, consume the Five Stars,
Focus thought on the Mud-Pellet Spirit.
At the center, swallow the sun’s light,
Silently chant to warm the Crimson Palace.
At dusk, guide the moon’s essence,
Irrigating the Lord of the Cinnabar Field.
Three Perfected generate one radiance,
Transformations—form naturally distinct.
At once, the myriad spirits return,
Gathering qi, radiance soars aloft.
Ascending to the palaces of sun and moon,
Exiting and entering, observing the Eight Gates.
Through the Dragon Han’s endless kalpas,
Wondrous indeed, the Numinous Treasure scriptures.

*Diagram of the Mushroom Maidens*
**Middle Division: Eighth True Qi**

Floating, the scattered numinous qi,
Mushroom blossoms follow the wind’s turn.
The heavens shower fragrant blossoms,
Sun and moon bathe in numinous splendor.
Jade maidens hold golden platters,
Brilliant, soaring through the void.
Gazing upward, I think of the Perfected’s descent,
Swallowing the mushroom to open the Five Spirits.
Guiding and refining—luminosity pierces,
Through ten thousand kalpas, the body does not decay.

The *Numinous Treasure Diagram of the Immortals* states: The Eight True Spirit Diagrams of the Middle Division, through the Primordial Beginning’s Numinous Treasure Grotto-Mystery qi, transform and engender the Middle Division’s Eight Radiant Spirits. Within the human body’s Middle Prime Palace, they bring forth the Middle Prime’s generative qi. With focused thought for eight years, the Eight Perfected manifest their radiance—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, conveying the immortals’ feathered canopy to soar through the great void.

The First Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Throat is named Hundred Streams Release, styled Daotong, of nine colors, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s First Radiant True Talisman, the First Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Diaphragm is named Pure Spirit Birth, styled Daoping, of white color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Second Radiant True Soaring Talisman, the Second Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Third Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Heart is named Radiant Yang Prosperity, styled Daoming, of red color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Third Radiant True Talisman, the Third Radiant Spirit of the Division.

Within the human body, they bring forth the Upper Prime’s generative qi. With concentrated thought within, the Eight Perfected manifest their forms—thousands of chariots and ten thousand riders, conveying radiant clouds to bear one upward in ascent.

chunks.original_text: 中真四景肝神，名开君童，字道青，色青，洞玄中元四景真符，部四景神。 中真五景胆神，名龙德拘，字道放，色青黄绿，洞玄中元五景真符，部五景神。 中真六景左肾神，名春元直，字道卿，五色衣，洞玄中元六景真符，部六景神。 中真七景右肾神，名像无他元，字道生，白黑色，洞玄中元七景真符，部七景神。 中真八景脾神，名宝元令，字道骞，正黄色，洞玄中元八景真符，部八景神。 神仙图曰：灵宝洞玄中元八景真符，以部中部八景神真，镇在人身中元宫中。 服之八年，中元八景见形，为己通灵达神，洞观八方，神芝玉浆，五气云芽，身生光明，神仙乘骑，飞行太空。 神仙六阴玉女图 下部第一真气 灵妃秀太微，玉女翠朱琼。 窈窕飞空出，飘飘乘虚生。 玄妙自然气，六阴安常形。 遐念希良会，仰眄降六丁。 携景金房内，妩婉娉精情。 玄感自来求，岂期形与名。 变化因凝发，应响神自灵。 神仙九元导仙图 下部第二真气 王清耀玄都，十圣回紫微。 神仙披云出，纷纷流羽衣。 香华随风散，十天乘空飞。 丹霄映轻盖，日月灌灵晖。 仰思妙真降，神感因心归。 神仙导引图 下部第三真气 郁郁五云芝，玄晖吐玉光。 凝津洞灵府，徘徊日月宫。 五色理高真，流精灌十方。 呼吸不觉疲，飞天并金容。 导引餐灵气，玄哺六胃充。 精思易致感，安坐睹空同。 神仙洞中洪保图 下部第四真气 餐气理太玄，萧萧群真居。 下治诸名山，洞房清且虚。 五色焕日月，列号众仙储。 上统紫微宫，总录天宝书。 中有守一士，精思待开图。 五老监魔试，心端情自愉。 身度水火宫，名入九天庐。 幸哉有衿人，遂得乘景舆。 神仙变化隐侧图 下部第五真气 变化空无中，五行逃身形。 洞思自然气，金木水火精。 土为隐侧府，六伐含景庭。 玉女变衣裳，老庄应响生。 细入毫厘裹，大包山岳灵。 种植通神草，身与八史并。 万化随所欲，逍遥可娱情。 神仙采芝开山图 下部第六真气 灵岳郁嵯峨，翠阜陵景霄。 五芝秀玄岭，仙草茂霜条。 上有采人集，被服乘羽飘。 灵洞万劫开，一焕诸天交。 得妙安觉淹，恒沙如一朝。 神仙明镜图 下部第七真气 妙锐生威光，流焕照八冥。 洞彻方圆内，通真别鬼精。 自然观重阴，照曜天人形。 伏魔致神仙，变化入紫庭。 神仙无极太一图 下部第八真气 焕烂帝一真，身生龙凤衣。 威光洞九天，烂照大囿圆。 上御诸天气，总为万仙君。 巍巍至道宗，落落大范门。 灵宝神仙图曰：下部八真神图，以元始灵宝洞玄之气，化生自然下部八景，在人身中下元宫中，致下元生气。 精思八年，下元八真使千乘万骑，运致神仙羽盖，载人俱升七宝林中。 下真一景胃神，名同朱育，字道展，黄色，洞神下元一景灵符，部一景神。 下真二景穷肠神，名兆滕康，字道还，黄赤色，洞神下元二景灵符，部二景神。 下真三景大小肠神，名蓬送留，字道厨，赤黄色，洞神下元三景灵符，部三景神。 下真四景胴中神，名受厚勃，字道虚，九色，洞神下元四景灵符，部四景神。 下真五景胸膈神，名广瑛宅，字道冲，色白，洞神下元五景灵符，部五景神 下真六景两胁神，名辟假马起，字道成，赤白色，洞神下元六景灵符，部六景神。 下真七景左阳神，名扶流，字道圭，青黄白色，洞神下元七景灵符，部七景神。
chunks.translated_text:
The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Liver is named Opening Lord Lad, styled Daoqing, of blue-green color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Fourth Radiant True Talisman, the Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Gallbladder is named Dragon Virtue Restrainer, styled Daofang, of blue-green-yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Fifth Radiant True Talisman, the Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Left Kidney is named Spring Prime Straightness, styled Daoqing, clad in five colors, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Sixth Radiant True Talisman, the Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Right Kidney is named Image of No-Other Prime, styled Daosheng, of white-black color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Seventh Radiant True Talisman, the Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Middle Prime’s Spleen is named Treasure Prime Command, styled Daoqian, of pure yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Eighth Radiant True Talisman, the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The *Immortals’ Charts* states: The Numinous Treasure Grotto-Mystery Middle Prime’s Eight Radiant True Talismans, by which the eight radiant spirit-truths of the central division are arrayed, are stationed within the Middle Prime Palace of the human body. By ingesting them for eight years, the Middle Prime’s eight radiant spirits manifest their forms, enabling one to commune with spirits and penetrate the numinous, to gaze through the eight directions, to partake of spirit mushrooms and jade nectar, of five qi cloud-sprouts, to radiate light from the body, and to ride with the immortals through the great void.

*Immortals’ Six Yin Jade Maidens Chart*
**First True Qi of the Lower Division**
The numinous consort shines in the Grand Tenuity,
The jade maiden, emerald and vermilion jasper.
Graceful, she soars forth from empty space,
Wafting, borne on the void’s arising.
Mysterious and wondrous, the qi of spontaneity,
The six yin rest in their constant forms.
With distant longing, I yearn for a fine encounter,
Gazing upward, I await the descent of the Six Dings.
Within the golden chamber of radiance she leads me,
Gentle and yielding, tender in spirit’s passion.
The dark resonance comes seeking of itself—
How could I have foreseen form or name?
Transformations arise from concentrated emanation,
Responding to echoes, the spirit’s own numinosity.

*Immortals’ Nine Prime Dao-Guiding Chart*
**Second True Qi of the Lower Division**
King Qing illuminates the Dark Metropolis,
Ten sages revolve through the Purple Tenuity.
Immortals emerge, clad in trailing clouds,
In profusion, streaming with feathered robes.
Fragrant blossoms scatter on the wind,
The ten heavens ride the void in flight.
The cinnabar empyrean reflects the light canopy,
Sun and moon bathe in radiant splendor.
Gazing upward, I long for the wondrous truth’s descent—
The spirit’s resonance returns through the heart’s devotion.

*Immortals’ Dao-Yin Chart*
**Third True Qi of the Lower Division**
Luxuriant, the five cloud-mushrooms,
Dark radiance spills forth jade light.
Congealed essences fill the numinous palace,
Lingering between the palaces of sun and moon.
Five hues order the lofty perfected,
Flowing essence irrigates the ten directions.
Breathing without wearying,
Flying heavenward alongside golden countenances.
Guiding and drawing in the spirit’s qi,
The dark nourishment fills the six stomachs.
With concentrated thought, resonance comes swiftly—
Calmly seated, one beholds the void as one.

*Immortals’ Grotto’s Vast Guardian Chart*
**Fourth True Qi of the Lower Division**
Ingesting qi to order the Great Mystery,
In quietude, the host of perfected dwell.
Below, they govern the famed mountains,
In grotto-chambers, clear and empty.
Five colors illumine sun and moon,
Their ranks arrayed as the immortals’ store.
Above, they govern the Purple Tenuity Palace,
Compiling the celestial treasure texts.
Within, a guardian of unity abides,
With concentrated thought, awaiting the chart’s unveiling.
The Five Elders oversee the demonic trials—
With a steadfast heart, joy arises of itself.
The body traverses the palaces of water and fire,
The name enters the nine heavens’ abodes.
Fortunate is the one who holds fast—
Thus attaining to ride the radiant chariot.

*Immortals’ Transformations and Concealments Chart*
**Fifth True Qi of the Lower Division**
Transformations arise within the empty void,
The five phases elude bodily form.
With profound thought, the qi of spontaneity,
The essences of metal, wood, water, and fire.
Earth becomes the palace of concealment,
The six subjugations contain the courtyard of radiance.
Jade maidens transform their raiment,
Laozi and Zhuangzi respond to echoes.
Subtly entering within the finest hairs,
Vastly embracing the mountains and peaks’ numinosity.
Cultivating the spirit herbs that bridge the Dao,
The body ranks alongside the Eight Histories.
Myriad transformations follow desire,
Carefree, one may delight the heart.

*Immortals’ Mushroom-Gathering and Mountain-Opening Chart*
**Sixth True Qi of the Lower Division**
The numinous peaks rise in towering majesty,
Emerald mounds ascend to the radiant empyrean.
Five mushrooms flourish on the dark ridges,
Immortal herbs thrive on frost-kissed branches.
Above, gather those who pluck them,
Clad in feathered robes, wafting on the wind.
The numinous grotto opens after ten thousand kalpas,
In a single radiance, all heavens converge.
Attaining the wondrous, one rests in awakened stillness—
As countless as the Ganges’ sands, yet like a single dawn.

*Immortals’ Luminous Mirror Chart*
**Seventh True Qi of the Lower Division**
Subtle acuity generates majestic light,
Flowing radiance illumines the eight obscurities.
Penetrating within square and round,
Communing with the perfected, distinguishing ghostly essences.
Spontaneously observing the heavy yin,
Illuminating the forms of heaven and humanity.
Subduing demons to summon immortals,
Transforming to enter the Purple Court.

*Immortals’ Boundless Great One Chart*
**Eighth True Qi of the Lower Division**
Resplendent, the Emperor’s One Truth,
The body clad in dragon and phoenix robes.
Majestic light penetrates the nine heavens,
Brilliant illumination fills the great park’s expanse.
Above, it governs the qi of all heavens,
Becoming the lord of ten thousand immortals.
Lofty, the ultimate Dao’s lineage,
Vast, the great model’s gate.

The *Numinous Treasure Immortals’ Charts* states: The Eight True Spirit Charts of the Lower Division, transformed by the Primordial Beginning’s Numinous Treasure Grotto-Mystery qi, give rise to the eight radiant spirits of the lower division, stationed within the Lower Prime Palace of the human body, conveying the Lower Prime’s generative qi. With eight years of concentrated thought, the Lower Prime’s eight true spirits dispatch ten thousand riders, bearing the immortals’ feathered canopy to carry one together into the Seven Treasures Grove.

The First Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Stomach is named Same as Zhu Yu, styled Daozhan, of yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s First Radiant Numinous Talisman, the First Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Exhausted Intestines is named Omen of Rising Health, styled Daohuan, of yellow-red color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Second Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Second Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Third Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Large and Small Intestines is named Vast Delivery Remnant, styled Daochu, of red-yellow color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Third Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Third Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Torso Center is named Receiving Thick Abundance, styled Daoxu, of nine colors, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Fourth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Chest Diaphragm is named Vast Radiance Dwelling, styled Daochong, of white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Fifth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Fifth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Two Flanks is named Warding Off Falsehood and Horse Rising, styled Daocheng, of red-white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Sixth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Sixth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Left Yang is named Supporting Flow, styled Daogui, of blue-green-yellow-white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Seventh Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Seventh Radiant Spirit of the Division.

chunks.original_text: 下真八景右阴神，名包表明，字道生，青黄白色，洞神下元八景灵符，部八景神。 神仙图曰：灵宝洞神下元八景灵符，以部八景神真，镇在人身下元宫中。 服之八年，下元八景见形，为人养精补气，练髓凝真，身生光泽，八景云举，载人飞行。 玉清七宝神仙图 总三八部真气。 萧萧三清上，凝真大罗天。 琼林翠玄台，日月焕灵轩。 飞天梵绿气，驾景垂紫烟。 郁郁披云出，纷纷排灵仙。 逍遥七宝林，五色暖金银。 披响众真会，灵歌庆万神。 精思三八景，超步登霄门。 赤明元年正月上寅一日午时，天光四朗，紫云回天，庆霄八会，灵风扫尘，日月吐晖，五星灌津，天地瞑津，流洒香华，河海静默，山岳藏烟，五苦咸解，三涂赦魂，九幽息对，长夜开关，聋盲聪明，六痾并痊，地藏发泄，金玉露形，白骨生气，腐骸还人，龙鳞踊跃，乌兽飞欣，三界长乐，人神欢焉。 是日大庆，万劫更新，元始天尊，延宾琼台，於赤明天中，南霍之岳，丹灵洞宫，敷罗五色，黄金为坛，白银荐地，七宝告灵，传度洞玄金书紫字玉文丹章自然灵 图，二十四真三部景神、天仙飞仙神仙地仙，兵马乘骑，以授太上无极道君，依威仪玄格，明真科文，度人九万九千九百九十九，宿有金名，列字诸天应仙之人。 大运之终，当收文还上大罗七宝玄台紫微宫中。 今三洞御运，灵宝下教，先度并升仙官空缺，应须中贤以充诸天黑帝真人。 北岳先生巨君，昔戊戌年九月十三日，於中天南洞，从中岳先生杨君受法，应更度人，先有宿名金格玉箓合真之人，以补天官，周历八极，从虚无中来。 今有宿命赤帝真人某甲，本命丙午，命属丹天南帝领籍，七月生，素天度炁，骨命合仙真，应补洞玄第二品仙。 今岁在某子某月若干日，於某天中，依先师旧科明真大法，身登黄坛，七宝镇灵，五彩证仙，授度无量自然灵宝洞玄金书，紫字玉文丹章，二十四真三八部图，神仙乘骑。 某受大法，三界所举，灵魔保明，身度五道，名入紫宫金简玉箓，位登真仙，出入游行，天仪羽服，云举龙驾，三七色节，前导凤歌，后从天钧，五帝启道，太极参轩，仙童玉女，散华烧香，宝盖垂瘾，营卫游行，和气齐满，身登仙宫。 宜遵俯仰，检口慎行，弃诸色累，断绝外想，静心夷默，专志在法，不得混浊，更相招引，以乱真气。 每行大慈，广度一切，国安民丰，四海宁一，七祖父母，皆得升度，身入光明，早生人中，大劫运周，同飞上清，逍遥金阙七宝林中。 其未仙度，备法七年，天气备足，天告玄应合仙之人，当依科以传。 自无灵感，四万劫勿宣。 盟负信，中泄灵文，生死父母长闭幽夜，身谢五道风刀万劫。 不敢有言，依科奉戒，生死同仙众行，一如明真之文。 九气天中空洞青灵魔王，姓 三气天中空洞赤灵魔王，姓 中黄高皇天中空洞黄灵魔王，姓 七气天中空洞白灵魔王，姓 五气天中空洞黑灵魔王，姓 　　洞天上部一景脑府真神道都神仙，洞天泥丸飞天上仙官各十四人。 洞天上部二景发府真神道衡神仙，洞天通精飞天上仙官各十四人。 洞天上部三景皮肤府真神道连神仙，洞天羽仪飞天上仙官各十四人。 洞天上部四景目府真神道童神仙，洞天洞明飞天上仙官各十六人。
chunks.translated_text:
The Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Lower Prime’s Right Yin is named Embracing Clarity, styled Daosheng, of blue-green-yellow-white color, bearing the Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Eighth Radiant Numinous Talisman, the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Division.

The *Illustrated Charts of Divine Immortals* states: The Numinous Treasure Grotto-Spirit Lower Prime’s Eighth Radiant Numinous Talisman, by virtue of the Eighth Radiant Spirit of the Division’s perfection, is enshrined within the Lower Prime Palace of the human body. After ingesting it for eight years, the Eight Radiant Spirits of the Lower Prime manifest in form, nurturing essence and replenishing qi, refining marrow and coagulating perfection. The body radiates luminous splendor, and the Eight Radiant Spirits ascend upon clouds, bearing one aloft in flight.

*The Jade Purity Seven Treasures Illustrated Charts of Divine Immortals* encompasses the Three Eights’ Division of True Qi:
---
Softly, softly, atop the Three Clarities,
Perfection congeals in the Great Canopy of Heaven.
Jade groves on the Emerald Mystery Terrace,
Sun and moon gleam in the Numinous Pavilion.
Flying immortals in verdant qi,
Riding the radiance, trailing purple mists.
Lushly they emerge through clouds,
In throngs arrayed as numinous immortals.
Carefree in the Seven Treasures Grove,
Five hues warm gold and silver.
Donning echoes, the assembly of perfected beings gathers,
Numinous hymns celebrate the myriad spirits.
With concentrated intent on the Three Eights’ Radiance,
One strides beyond to ascend the Gate of Heaven.
---

In the first year of the Vermilion Brightness, on the first *yin* day of the first month, at the hour of noon, the heavens shone with fourfold brilliance, purple clouds coiled through the sky, the Eight Assemblies of the Empyrean rejoiced, numinous winds swept away dust, sun and moon exhaled radiance, the five stars poured forth their essences, heaven and earth were steeped in twilight mists, fragrant blossoms rained down, rivers and seas stilled, mountains and peaks concealed their vapors. The Five Sufferings were all dissolved, the Three Paths released their souls, the Nine Dark Realms ceased their torments, the gates of eternal night swung open, the deaf and blind regained hearing and sight, the Six Afflictions were all healed, the Earth Treasury unsealed, gold and jade revealed their forms, white bones quickened with qi, decayed remains returned to life, dragon scales leapt and danced, birds and beasts soared in joy. The Three Realms knew enduring bliss, humans and spirits rejoiced as one.

On this day of great celebration, the myriad kalpas were renewed. The Celestial Venerable of Primordial Beginning extended his hospitality upon the Jade Terrace. In the Vermilion Brightness Heaven, upon the Southern Fire Peak, within the Cinnabar Numinous Grotto Palace, he unfurled the Five Colors, fashioned an altar of yellow gold, and spread a foundation of white silver. The Seven Treasures proclaimed the numinous, and he transmitted the *Cavern Mystery Golden Writ of the Purple Script and Vermilion Chapters of Spontaneous Numinous Charts*, along with the Twenty-Four Perfected and the Three Divisions’ Radiant Spirits, the Heavenly Immortals, Flying Immortals, Divine Immortals, and Earthbound Immortals, their legions of troops and mounts, to the Supreme Peerless Dao Lord. Following the solemn protocols and mysterious statutes, he illuminated the true ordinances and scriptures, initiating ninety-nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine individuals whose names were inscribed in gold, whose characters were arrayed across the heavens—those destined to ascend as immortals.

At the conclusion of the great kalpic cycle, the texts shall be gathered and returned to the Seven Treasures Mysterious Terrace of the Great Canopy’s Purple Tenuity Palace. Now, as the Three Caverns govern the kalpic flow and the Numinous Treasure’s Lower Teaching prevails, the vacancies among the celestial offices of the ascending immortals must first be filled by those of middling worth to complete the ranks of the Black Emperor’s Perfected of the Nine Heavens.

The Master of the Northern Peak, Lord Ju, formerly received the teachings in the *Xu* year, on the thirteenth day of the ninth month, at the Southern Grotto of the Central Heaven, from the Master of the Central Peak, Lord Yang. As he was destined to initiate others, those whose names were preordained in the golden registers and jade records, whose natures aligned with perfection, were to be selected to fill the celestial offices, traversing the Eight Poles and arriving from the midst of the Void.

Now, the destined life of the Vermilion Emperor’s Perfected, so-and-so, born in the *bing-wu* year, whose fate is governed by the Southern Emperor of the Cinnabar Heaven, born in the seventh month, imbued with the primordial qi of the Plain Heaven’s destiny, whose bones and fate align with the immortal perfected, is to fill the office of Second-Rank Immortal of the Cavern Mystery. In this year, on such-and-such a day of such-and-such a month, within such-and-such a heaven, in accordance with the ancient ordinances of the former master’s luminous and true great method, he ascends the Yellow Altar. The Seven Treasures secure the numinous, the Five Colors attest to his immortality, and he is initiated into the boundless *Spontaneous Numinous Treasure Cavern Mystery Golden Writ*, the *Purple Script and Vermilion Chapters of Jade Text*, the *Charts of the Twenty-Four Perfected and Three Eights’ Divisions*, and the divine immortals’ mounts.

Having received the great method, he is acclaimed by the Three Realms. The numinous demons safeguard his clarity, his person traverses the Five Paths, his name is inscribed in the Golden Tablets and Jade Records of the Purple Palace. His rank ascends to Perfected Immortal, and he roams freely, clad in the celestial regalia of feathered robes. He ascends upon clouds, borne by dragon-drawn chariots, preceded by the Three Sevens’ colored standards, heralded by phoenix songs, followed by the Heavenly Chime. The Five Emperors open the Way, the Supreme Ultimate attends his chariot, immortal youths and jade maidens scatter blossoms and burn incense, jeweled canopies trail their tassels, encircling and protecting his journey. Harmonious qi fills him to abundance, and he ascends to the immortal palaces.

He must observe proper conduct in movement and stillness, guard his speech, and be vigilant in his actions. He must cast aside all worldly entanglements, sever extraneous thoughts, calm his mind, and embrace silence, focusing his will solely upon the method. He must not allow turbidity, nor incite others to distraction, lest he disrupt the true qi. In all his actions, he must practice great compassion, broadly delivering all beings, ensuring the nation’s peace and the people’s prosperity, unifying the Four Seas in tranquility. His seven generations of ancestors and parents shall all ascend and be delivered, his person shall enter luminosity, and he shall be reborn early among humankind. When the great kalpic cycle turns, he shall ascend together to the Supreme Clarity, carefree in the Seven Treasures Grove of the Golden Portals.

Those not yet initiated as immortals must complete seven years of the method’s practice, until their celestial qi is fully prepared. When the celestial signs proclaim that one’s destiny aligns with perfection, the transmission shall proceed in accordance with the ordinances. If one lacks numinous resonance, the teachings must not be disseminated for forty thousand kalpas. Should one betray the covenant or leak the sacred texts, their parents in life and death shall be eternally confined to the dark night, and their person shall perish amidst the Five Paths’ winds and blades for ten thousand kalpas.

Without daring to speak further, he adheres to the ordinances and upholds the precepts, uniting with the immortal host in life and death, all in accordance with the *Luminous and True Scriptures*.

The Second Radiant Spirit of the Upper Division of the Cavern Heavens, the True Spirit of the Hair Palace, the Dao Balance Divine Immortal, and the Flying Heavenly Immortals of the Cavern Heavens’ Communicating Essence, fourteen each.
The Third Radiant Spirit of the Upper Division of the Cavern Heavens, the True Spirit of the Skin Palace, the Dao Link Divine Immortal, and the Flying Heavenly Immortals of the Cavern Heavens’ Feathered Regalia, fourteen each.
The Fourth Radiant Spirit of the Upper Division of the Cavern Heavens, the True Spirit of the Eye Palace, the Dao Youth Divine Immortal, and the Flying Heavenly Immortals of the Cavern Heavens’ Cavernous Luminosity, sixteen each.
